output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes, contains "CMF11240017" 2. Refers to candidate: Yes, mentions "Marcel Ciolacu" who is a presidential candidate 3. Addresses wide population: Yes, it's a paid advertisement with significant reach (15,000-19,999 impressions) 4. Electoral objective: While discussing local activities and government programs, it promotes Marcel Ciolacu by highlighting positive achievements of his government 5. Journalism: No, this is clearly a campaign activity report 6. Personal opinion: No, this is a structured campaign message with CMF number
The post describes a door-to-door campaign visit to Lazuri de Beiuș and Hinchiriș, highlighting successful government programs under Marcel Ciolacu's leadership. The presence of the CMF number and campaign hashtag #caleasigurapentruromania indicates this is electoral content.

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This post constitutes electoral propaganda because: - Contains official CMF number - Directly references presidential candidate Marcel Ciolacu - Links positive achievements to Ciolacu's government - Uses campaign hashtag - Is a paid advertisement reaching a wide audience - Shows campaign activities
conclusion.message-for-police: Infomed Pro SRL, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea platita pe Facebook si Instagram a unui mesaj de propaganda electorala (ID postare: 2312255482440591) dupa incheierea perioadei de campanie electorala pentru alegerile prezidentiale (dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024). Postarea contine numar CMF (CMF11240017), promoveaza explicit realizarile guvernului condus de candidatul prezidential Marcel Ciolacu, foloseste hashtag-ul de campanie #caleasigurapentruromania, si prezinta activitati de campanie electorala, cu un impact pozitiv direct asupra imaginii candidatului. Mesajul a avut o audienta semnificativa, atingand intre 15.000 si 19.999 de afisari, cu un buget de promovare intre 200 si 299 RON.
